upgrade_lite_device.name: Upgrade Lite Device (Magic Upgrade)
upgrade_lite_device.description:
Unlocks "Full" features on a Mysa Baseboard V2 Lite (BB-V2-0-L) by changing its model type to standard BB-V2-0.

⚠️ WARNING: This modifies firmware settings and may void your warranty. Use at your own risk.
Requires power cycling the device afterwards.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Mysa Lite device to upgrade.

downgrade_lite_device.name: Revert Lite Device (Undo Upgrade)
downgrade_lite_device.description:
Reverts a Mysa Baseboard V2 Lite device back to its original factory Model ID (BB-V2-0-L).
Use this if you need to reverse the "Magic Upgrade".

⚠️ WARNING: This modifies firmware settings. Use at your own risk.
Requires power cycling the device afterwards.

killer_ping.name: Killer Ping (Restart to Pairing Mode)
killer_ping.description:
Sends a special command that RESTARTS the device into PAIRING MODE.
The device will disconnect from your network and need to be re-paired using the Mysa app.

⚠️⚠️ DANGER: This is a DESTRUCTIVE action! ⚠️⚠️
- The device will be DISCONNECTED from your network
- You will need to physically RE-PAIR the device
- Only use this if you need to move the device to a new network

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Mysa device to restart into pairing mode.
